metadata.title: CVE-2024-42314 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Certified (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved:btrfs: fix extent map use-after-free when adding pages to compressed bioAt add_ra_bio_pages() we are accessing the extent map to calculate'add_size' after we dropped our reference on the extent map, resultingin a use-after-free. Fix this by computing 'add_size' before dropping ourextent map reference.

criterions.comment: linux-fips package in fips/xenial is affected and may need fixing.
